website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use model by a brand known for quality appliances – this machine is no exception, but some consumers may prefer a model that makes finer shaved ice.
pros: Prepares ice for snow cones quickly with a simple flip of an on-off switch
Has a convenient tray that pops out for holding up to 4 cones
Removable ice compartment is easy to clean
cons: Ice texture is coarse, but some consumers prefer this "traditional" snow cone texture

customer_reviews.title: No customer support from supplier or Amazon😩
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with supplier AND Amazon! I bought this ice shaver ahead for an upcoming party. The unit worked fine the first few times. It began to malfunction and now only works intermittently. I notified the supplier and also Amazon for their A to Z guarantee. Neither party would refund, repair or help me. Don't buy this snow cone machine!☹️
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth more than twenty bucks
customer_reviews.text: Cute in theory, it's more like a wanna-be sno cone maker but it does work ok-ish...the handle is plastic so be careful not to put too much pressure on it, and ice has to be small and can't be put in in chunks or else it won't chop the ice. VERY slow ice chipper, very cheap. The best part about this is the scoop....The scoop makes cute little round sno cone tops...I would give this a 5 star if it were bigger but for the price, I just cannot do that..This thing is TINY and SLOW
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: amazingly simple, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical over buying the Cuisinart Snow Cone Maker over renting one for a large gathering even though it was less money than the rental. Turns out this little machine did all that was asked of it by the kids and the adults. I love the consistency of the ice it creates. I am impressed with the simplicity of use and cleanup just means drying it. It looks great and it has the ability to make adequate amounts for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: PJT

customer_reviews.title: I love my warning pro
customer_reviews.text: Thanku so much!! I love my warning pro, I use it on a regular basis! I would definitely buy this item again, it's a hit at any party!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes CRUSHED ice, not shaved!
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT make shaved ice. It's more like crushed ice with some big chunks that you have to chew. Not the snow cone texture I remember from my childhood. Returning and going to try a different brand. Bummer because everything else about this machine is pretty cool :-/
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Green

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy blades come loose tiny screws can be ingested
customer_reviews.text: Okay we're giving the review on this product this is the third time that we are using it we noticed the ice was not being crushed anymore we looked inside and found the blades one got pushed in and one play just came out and fell into the ice tray the screws got loose that hold the blade 3 in the nuts disappeared for a bit then my wife found them in the ice bin good thing we did not eat those little tiny screws we do not recommend this product it is faulty we are sending it back and contacting Amazon
customer_reviews.author: sephira

customer_reviews.title: A must have in the Summer
customer_reviews.text: If you are planning to serve several snow cones then this is the way to go. The machine is very sturdy and the fact the shaved ice collects in the bin is perfect for serving up your excited snow cone fans. We bought a bag of ice, threw it in a cooler and placed a large amount of ice cubes. The machine handled it without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: joni levinson

customer_reviews.title: Never turned on. Very difficult to return
customer_reviews.text: Product never turned on. Tried replacing bin several times. Used only a few ice cubes.... nothing. Then I had to spend a ridiculous amount time with the Amazon tech people trying to return the item because they had to verify it is defective. Was going to just have them send out a replacement but at this point they can just have it back and I will go to Walmart
customer_reviews.author: Anne Park

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 3 uses. Doesn’t power on
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less the. A year. Used it 3 times
customer_reviews.author: onyx

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Worst product I’ve ever bought from Amazon. First of all, I never do reviews but I always check the reviews before I buy something. The 4.5 stars is misleading. Everything except the small shaving blades is plastic and flimsy. The product itself is a piece of junk. The second day I used it, it stopped working. Made about 5 small snow cones and that’s it never worked again. Worst $50+ I’ve ever spent on here. Horrible
customer_reviews.author: Tamahawk316

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a hundred percent happy with this item I thought I will have snow ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a hundred percent happy with this item I thought I will have snow cones for my kids what I had more is a crunched ice that's perfect for margaritas but not for snow cones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties
customer_reviews.text: Good snow cone maker for the price. It is so fast and my husband and I love using it at parties to make drinks with. The only thing I don’t like is the shape of the portion that holds the shaved ice. It has these crevices in the bottom that keeps you from getting all the ice out without using a spatula. Ice gets caught in that area every single time you use it. Overall, it’s great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Not like snow cones at all!
customer_reviews.text: I dont know how this got so many positive reviews??? Snow cones are suppose to be shaved ice, not crushed ice...this was definitely crushed ice. Which means, any flavor you use will just sink to the bottom and you'll be crunching your ice away and drink the flavor at the bottom. I will be returning and spending the extra money for a little snowie, who actually gets the concept of snow cones!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Wilson

customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I work at a psychiatric clinics, so in the summer I always make snow cones for the clients and they love it. It's easy to work with and easy to clean. You can use ice from the freezer or ice you buy from the store. Just make sure you don't overload where you put the ice in or the machine will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Super Satisfied Hubby
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves chewing ice...but as most of us know it destroys your teeth. Hoping this ice shaver will help to alleviate the problem. We'll see at next dental appt. Very easy to use and clean. Would have preferred metal shoot depresser, for longevity, but doesn't seem to be a problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Takes up alot of counter space
customer_reviews.text: Not all ice shave as tiny but if you like snow cones or frozen drinks, its great. I am not happy with it. It doesn't work like I hoped. The flapper on top where ice goes in has to be held down while crushing ice. I want to return it but there is a 30 day window and I only used it two times. I am very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: the ice is not details.. not snow but ...
customer_reviews.text: the ice is not details.. not snow but scratch ice.. if you want power ice.. dont buy this one, also i push down the handle but seem the blade moving and now create gap for thicker ice to drop down..
customer_reviews.author: Stan & Dustin Prime account

customer_reviews.title: A Definite HIT
customer_reviews.text: This is a purchase for when my grand kids comes to my house, but I used it during Christmas and everybody loves it; the adults as well!
customer_reviews.author: FMConnect

customer_reviews.title: GREAT purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son's birthday party. HUGE hit!!! The kids AND adults loved it!! It was so easy to use. We used it again when we got home n made more. Our refrigerator ice didn't form as well as store bought ice but was still awesome. Would highly recommend this product, it's something different and fun. My children are all planning uses for it (making up a few events just to use it lol)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: All plastic and not good shavings
customer_reviews.text: It's all cheap plastic, and there's a large gap between the blade and the ice inlet. It just makes sizable chunks of ice, with some shavings between. Don't pay a premium for the name or the image, definitely not a high quality product, maybe on part with units half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel!!

customer_reviews.title: Crushed ice, not shaved ice
customer_reviews.text: I had to send it back--my husband hated it. I thought it was okay--it was nice having an icee-type machine, but it wasn't what I wanted. I sent it back and got Little Snowie instead and couldn't be happier. Yeah, it's four times the cost, but this is definitely a case of getting what you pay for. Since hubby and I are doing low-carb, I wanted something we could make desserts with, and this wasn't it. It might work for you though.
customer_reviews.author: Kyrie

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Quite a bit of plastic so you cannot get too aggressive with the ice pusher, but it worked for three kid birthday parties so far so it’s paid for itself already.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this b/c it was the same price as renting a commercial snow cone machine- I figured if I got 2 uses out of it, it would pay for itself, so far so good. It works well, is easy to clean, and the residents at my Assistive Living facility love it- the handle is plastic and I read the reviews and learned to press straight down with it to avoid breaking it- so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Geri Hardee

customer_reviews.title: used almost every day.
customer_reviews.text: The syrups you use will play a large role in how much you like this machine. I bought some from a local retail store and it was disappointing. I ordered the Hawaiian brand syrups and it's delicious! Kids are making them all day so I don't have to buy ice cream, or popsicles ! The only reason I don't give a 5 star rating is because it's all plastic and I'm almost certain the handle is going to snap off one day while someone is pushing down on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rene71

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because me and my niece love snow cones and we have definitely got our money's worth. This is one of my favorite purchases from Amazon!!! It's easy to use and grinds the ice up almost as fine as snow. I've made snow cones for all my friends and family and they all loved them. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: Received this sno cone maker from Amazon and it was DOA.  Would not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very cheaply made of thin wall plastic. There is not a single piece of metal on it except for the switch and the blades. The blades are mounted on a plastic disk. The entire unit bends and flexes with the littlest amount of force applied to it and the handle on the shaver bends and flexes easily. Not the level of quality one would expect for a product branded with the Cuisinart name. I cannot even comment on the ice shaving quality or amount of time it takes to shave a cup of ice as it was received DOA at our house and returned immediately. What a total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: DB2 MI

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is so much more compact than I thought, which is great because it fits on my counter and doesn’t stick out like a sore thumb! Doesn’t shave the ice very fine, more like crushes it. I wish it was a more fine shave but it’s still a really great machine! Perfect for summer!
customer_reviews.author: kirstin

customer_reviews.title: For the price it’s really fast!
customer_reviews.text: My 7,8, and 9 year old love it. It’s extremely easy to use and crushes ice really fast. My oldest makes them by himself. The ones that struggled to crush ice probably used too much. It will lock if you use too much or large chunks. Even though you have to keep adding ice it doesn’t take very long. I made snow cones for about 20 people in roughly 5 minutes. If your ice doesn’t stick add alittle water in the tray and mix it around.
customer_reviews.author: Emily i

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use!
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with this product- I bought in June of this year, but just opened the box to use for the first time in Oct 4th (past the return window). After ONE use (literally one snow cone), the on/ off switch came loose and fell INSIDE the machine-- the only way to retrieve it would be to take it completely apart. It is now completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: robin irwin

customer_reviews.title: We Love It
customer_reviews.text: It's counter top size and perfect for individual family. We purchased it for a small wedding celebration but it arrived late. I waited a week to open it but when we did, the four of us enjoyed snow cones & looking forward to using it for the rest of the summer. I rated a four out of five because it is too small for a party but perfect for individual/family use!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick's

customer_reviews.title: So darn great!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this thing soooooo much. It rips through ice so quickly. Makes perfectly chipped, shaved slushy or snow cone ice (basically the difference, to me, is if you use syrup to make a snow cone or a type of drink to make a slush(. My new favorite is using old cold coffee to make those 4$ iced coffees you can buy from Starbucks).
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Kids can operate it. Great price. I did not buy syrups bc I don’t like the sticky, but the kids are happy with just the ice! If you have a special place you want to plug this in, make sure the upper cabinets are far enough from the counter to fully raise the “push” lever.
customer_reviews.author: Liz, Florida

customer_reviews.title: He's a big fan of shaved ice and I thought this would be adorable. It works well and is very easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad for Father's Day. He's a big fan of shaved ice and I thought this would be adorable. It works well and is very easy to use and clean. The only downside is that the ice is a little more chunky than what I was hoping for out of an $80 toy. Other than that it is cute on the countertop and a hit at every party.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable! Bought my son the Nostalgia brand for Christmas and shipped it back because it was awful! Was hesitant in buying another but tried out the Cuisinart one and it’s amazing! Works so fast, simple clean up - you won’t be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Make me a Snow Cone
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a great snow cone maker/ice crusher, the Cuisinart Snow Cone Maker is a great one to have. There is no mess to clean up, the ice cubes crush easily, the cone shaper is great, and you can make as many snow cones as you want. I crush about 20 pounds of ice weekly and have had no problems. All of the features seem to be well make, sturdy, and capable to handle the largest snow cone needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This product was bought for my son’s first birthday. After 35 mins and 10 snow cones the product stopped working. It was easy to assemble but left a lot of kids disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make snow-cones for the kids and adult beverages. It makes wonderful, fluffy shaved ice. It really is a snow consistency. I believe the temperature of your ice might give different results. The colder the better! The only disappointment with this product is the cb plastic handle/ice pusher. It seems like you could break this if you are not patient.
customer_reviews.author: J.Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great summer treat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a kids party. It was a HUGE hit with the kids and adults. Everyone wanted a snow cone! The machine doesn't make the ice as thin as we would have liked but it does the job. The ice comes out in small chuncks not like powder ice but it was good. UPDATE: after a year later this machine is still working and it's still a huge hit. My kids love it, my son says this is the best thing I ever bought
customer_reviews.author: Chad V/Vanessa V

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use! Wish handle was metal :(
customer_reviews.text: Great little product. Makes shaved ice for slushies or snow cones. I don't know how long it will hold up since the handle that pushes the ice cubes to be crushed is made from plastic. I think if it were aluminum it would last. Just don't put to much pressure on the handle and it should be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Price.
customer_reviews.text: Happy I got this at a good sale price, but that's what its worth ($69) seems well made, cuts ice just ok, some bigger chips get through. Plastic handle that pushes ice through blade seems suspect for breaking, so we'll see if it lasts. I like the large easy to use ice bin.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Zednick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the snowcone maker. Must buy the shield to avoid splattering all over the walls. Makes excellent snow cones. Wouldn’t doubt that this product could be used commercially.
customer_reviews.author: william n.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: The ice is shaved so thin it's perfect. The packaging was perfect the delivery was fast the ice was amazing the Syrupt didnt arrive yet so I made plain shaved ice for the kids and OMG they loved it lol lol lol
customer_reviews.author: V. Faciane

customer_reviews.title: It worked great! Very easy to use and grinds the ice ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use at my children's school carnival. Made over 200 Snow Cones in about a 3 hour time period. It worked great! Very easy to use and grinds the ice quickly. The enclosed scoop made for a nice presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snowcones in a minute
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t take long to make a frosty treat. It is noisy and requires firm pressing of the handle, which can become tiresome if making a lot at once. Definitely only for adult use since the blade is not too far away, down a curved tube. Occasional chunks of ice make it through.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Parietti Scharf

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fluffy ice shavings!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids are loving this! It makes fluffy flakes of ice. I find it holds together better if you wait a few mins to let it melt a bit. But it's a breeze to use and clean up. Great to have in the hot summer months!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I absolutely love this Shaved Ice Machine, it shaves fine, and ice is very fluffy. Should have gotten one of these years ago, I have been missing out. I also found a creamy shaved ice receipt online that tastes so good. You will not be disappointed. Its a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Hapa

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We like the shaved ice, it’s easy to use and clean but you have to be careful to only use a little ice at a time. It freezes up after a couple of minutes and you have to turn off, unplug and turn over to scrape the frozen ice out to start again. I don’t think I would recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Collier

customer_reviews.title: didn't last a year.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, and it worked great for a few months, but it stopped working completely at 9 months.
customer_reviews.author: SMack

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: We got tired of spending $10 every time the KONA truck machine would drive by our neighborhood. We are having so much fun making snow cones as a family. This is great for hot days or even as a treat if kids behave well. I would HIGHLY recommend purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: A good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son bought this with his money for when he has “friends & family over” he gets one here and there on his own, but he handles it just fine and I don’t worry about him hurting something. The shaved ice drawer is nice and big, it’s lightweight and easy to pack up to take along to places, and the shave is down into the machine where you can cut off a finger etc it has a safety mechanism in it where it won’t turn on unless you’re doing it properly
customer_reviews.author: bsiljenberg

customer_reviews.title: Does not crush ice well
customer_reviews.text: Ours did not crush ice well. My husband complained, used 3 times and now its sitting in the cabinet
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased overall!
customer_reviews.text: I'm overall happy with this purchase. I think for the price it is overall a good quality. My only 2 complaints is the handle seems a little flimsy and the ice is more course than I expected. I thought it'd be finely shaved more like snow, but it's more like an old fashion snow cone from the fair. It'll serve its purpose and get used plenty!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Best snow cone machine is amazing! I had ordered a couple of others is that they were snow cone machines from eBay but they did not work well but I'm very happy with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Maralee

customer_reviews.title: Makes great snow balls
customer_reviews.text: What a great gadget. I use it every day to make snow balls for my dog. Probably not the original intended use but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA BODIN

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as reviews said
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the reviews and brand. The ice for the snow cones were very large chunks. If you like chewing ice, this is probably great for you. If you like smooth snow cones, I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: usuallyhappy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Snow cone Machine
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. The first time we used it I brought it camping. I figured what better time to relax and figure out how to use it but it was so easy it was unbelievable. It was a big hit with everyone and I’m going to use it this summer for my daycare kids....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took me back to my childhood! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This snow cone maker brought back so many childhood memories for me that now I was able to share with my grandkids they love it! It really made me feel like a kid again! It’s sturdy and affordable! Thanks for the memories!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Well built but grinds rather than shaves the snow--way too crunchy
customer_reviews.text: Cuisinart makes solid and dependable products. Unfortunately this one doesn't make snow cones, it makes slushies. The ice came out in small chunks rather than soft ice fluff. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: jorlowitz

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: just got it today but it works just fine with the half moon ice cubes my freezer makes. the resulting product is more snowy than i had hoped for - was looking more for a crusher but i can work with it.
customer_reviews.author: Toni A. Ritchey

customer_reviews.title: Ice cone Maker
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy this machine very much as a family. It's very easy to use, very safe and easy to clean. It doesn't make a mess while crushing ice. It also lasted us about 2 years now and still working.
customer_reviews.author: FLStudent

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has always wanted a snowball maker, did a little research and found the Cuisinart was the best one out there for us and it didn't disappoint. Family loves this and the fact we can get snowballs when ever we want.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Dingman

customer_reviews.title: Does not crush fine
customer_reviews.text: The machine itself works very well, I was however dissapointed. If you are looking for a machine for shaved ice for snowcones, this wasn't it for me. It does not crush fine, maybe pea size chunks of ice.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Utterback

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Chrissy Teigan recommended this item in a tweet or instagram, I can remember. I admired the bright red color and on the recommendation of Chrissy I bought one as a gift for a friend who entertains quite a bit. It's always a big hit with children and adults when snow-cone time arrives! It's nicely compact and stores away in the pantry neatly. A fun addition for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Les Olson

customer_reviews.title: awesome for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.text: watch the you tube tutorial .. it is a great product ... love using it!
customer_reviews.author: Krissi

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love a good snow cone!
customer_reviews.text: What a blast the grand children had! I keep it on the counter since we make snow cones often. The ice doesn't shave as fine as snow cones should be but for the price, this is just fine. It is all plastic so I question the sturdiness of it. Especially the handle. If care is taken then it will give you memorable fun for the family.
customer_reviews.author: suanne weller

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute hard plastic machine. I returned mine because I wanted snow cone ice which to me is soft snow like ice... This machine makes small chunk ice.
customer_reviews.author: Bird 🐦

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sno cones everytime
customer_reviews.text: Simple as 123. I am constantly making amo cones at my house. So simple and easy to clean. This is a must buy. Package came perfectly with no issues or damages
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great snow cones
customer_reviews.text: We have used this every night this summer and love it ! It makes great snow cones. If your looking to make good family memories this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to make sno cones
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sno cone maker. It’s easy to use. I got it particularly for my 9 year old granddaughter, and she loves making sno cones with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce P.

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT MAKE SHAVED ICE! Only crushes them!
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT make shaved ice. Makes crushed ice. The ice pieces are to big and chunky for snow cones! Deceptive marketing!
customer_reviews.author: ogdenweber

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  Good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived intact and on time. Easy to use. Holds a good amount of shaved ice. Approximately 25 cubes to make a snow cone, depending on how densely packed you prefer.
customer_reviews.author: AnneShirley

customer_reviews.title: Kinda loud and...
customer_reviews.text: uses a lot of ice to make for a crowd. Makes nice crushed ice, but is a touch thin as a lot melts when any liquid is added to it (syrup, mixer, booze).
customer_reviews.author: Jon B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This snow cone maker was a huge hit with my family on Christmas! Me and my son also uses it daily. He loves to eat ice, and I just crush some for him and me. I usually pour coca-cola over mine. Definitely worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: WIshopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellant Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, very well made. Be carehul though, Blades are sharp , got cut while cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Windeebyrd

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t meet the kids expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Machine gives you nothing like a real snow cone. The ice isn’t fine or dense, it’s quite chunky and barely holds syrups. For quisinart this was a sad attempt with their technology.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C Keyser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know which snow cone maker to get for my husband's birthday and I really trust the Cuisinart Brand so I was confident this would be the best and it was!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Lynn Reecer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It worked for the first 5 snow cones and then it stopped working and that is all we got. We tried a little later and it made 1 more then died on us
customer_reviews.author: E Merino

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift for kods
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. I bought three others before finding this Have already made tons of snow cones kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Love the snow cone machine
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice bright red and comes with cones and scooper. It's easy, light weight and makes great snow cones. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Love this snow cone maker
customer_reviews.text: I love this snow cone machine and love making snow cones!! I found recipe for syrup you can make yourself on internet.
customer_reviews.author: Trudi Clay

customer_reviews.title: Nephew really enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my young nephew. It was a real hit. Everybody wanted some and he had fun making it.
customer_reviews.author: a3 NYC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Its a great machine. Suprisingly light weight. I absolutely love it. I used it at a family gathering and now everyone wants one.
customer_reviews.author: camille robertson

customer_reviews.title: Works when it wants to work

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect snow cones
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! We had a huge birthday bash and I was able to make 25 of these in no time at all. Makes perfect snow cone ice. Love the scoop that it comes with too!
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyT

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working quickly, then started working again later.
customer_reviews.text: Made 5 cups then wouldn’t turn on again. I saw warnings in a minority of Amazon reviews and decided to take a risk. Wish I hadn’t. [Update] A few days later it seems to work again. Not sure what to expect from it at this point. Upgraded to 2 stars for now.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Smith

customer_reviews.title: ... for our Fourth of July party and it worked great! Kids from 4 years old (with assistance) to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Fourth of July party and it worked great! Kids from 4 years old (with assistance) to 16 years old used it on and off for 4 hours. It held up great and after wiping it down, looks brand new again. I paid more hoping for good quality and it is worth the money. I will be using it for many more pool parties!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Great addition to grand kids summer activities. They loved helping. Machine crushed ice cubes with ease; just follow instructions. Daughter decided it would be a good Friday treat for office staff.

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughter's birthday and she loves it. She makes sno cones every day! It crushes ice quickly and easily and you can really make a lot. It's very easy to clean and simple to use.

customer_reviews.text: This is a good product but it doesn't make snow cone like ice. It's better for like drinks than snow cones
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Not Really Shaved Ice
customer_reviews.text: I like the speed of this though it's closer to crushed ice than it is to shaved ice. The ice came out small like tiny beads that I still have to chew, though it would make good slushies instead of shaved ice. However, it was very simple to use, it looks like a classic, and it was safe.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snow cone maker
customer_reviews.text: This snow cone maker is absolutely perfect! I bought this for my daughter's 6th birthday party and it was a hit. I was able to make snow cones fast enough for 7 kids (plus adults) within minutes. Perfect for impatient kids! It shaves the ice extremely fast and makes a bunch at a time. I would highly recommend this product!

product_meta.title: Cuisinart Snow Cone Maker, One Size, Red
product_meta.description: Style Name:CuisinartThe Cuisinart Snow Cone Maker creates icy, sweet, delicious treats in seconds! Use it to make snow cones, slushies', frozen lemonades, and even adult party drinks. It's fast and effortless to operate - just add ice cubes and it quickly shaves enough ice for 4-5 cones in under a minute. Top off the ice with simple syrup, juice, or adult drink mixers for cool, refreshing fun! It's compact enough to fit on the counter, and lightweight enough to be moved around for parties. The ice bin is removable and is easy to empty and wipe clean. A pop-out tray holds four cones for convenient serving and storage, and the unit comes with four BPA-free reusable cones and 12 paper cones, plus recipes. A fun surprise for the family, and a big hit at parties!
feature_bullets: Creates real shaved ice for snow cones, slushies', frozen lemonades or adult drinks
Uses regular ice cubes and simple syrups or juices - recipes included
Easy to put together and use - just flip a switch to start shaving ice
Fast operation, makes enough ice for 4-5 cones in under a minute
All parts that come into contact with food are BPA free
